# Glaze Lock (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Creation Spells|creation]]) \[[[Cold Spells|cold]]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Lock touched

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level; see text

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Frostburn (WotC), pg. 97

You jam a locking mechanism with ice, raising its [[Disable Device (Skill)|Disable Device]] DC by 10 and the lockâ€™s hardness by 5. Fire attacks against the lock deal double damage. In cold or lower temperature bands, this spell lasts 1 hour per level.
